content.text: Match ends, Barcelona 4, Borussia Mönchengladbach 0.
Second Half ends, Barcelona 4, Borussia Mönchengladbach 0.
Attempt missed. Lucas Digne (Barcelona) left footed shot from outside the box is too high following a corner.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Tobias Strobl.
Denis Suárez (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Tobias Strobl (Borussia Mönchengladbach).
Raffael (Borussia Mönchengladbach) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by André Gomes (Barcelona).
Substitution, Barcelona. Marc Cardona replaces Arda Turan.
Attempt saved. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) header from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Lucas Digne with a cross.
Substitution, Borussia Mönchengladbach. Raffael replaces Thorgan Hazard.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Tony Jantschke.
Thorgan Hazard (Borussia Mönchengladbach) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Samuel Umtiti (Barcelona).
Goal!  Barcelona 4, Borussia Mönchengladbach 0. Arda Turan (Barcelona) right footed shot from very close range to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Paco Alcácer.
Foul by Fabian Johnson (Borussia Mönchengladbach).
Javier Mascherano (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt blocked. Rafinha (Barcelona) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Lionel Messi.
Thorgan Hazard (Borussia Mönchengladbach) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Lucas Digne (Barcelona).
Substitution, Barcelona. Rafinha replaces Andrés Iniesta.
André Hahn (Borussia Mönchengladbach) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Samuel Umtiti (Barcelona).
Substitution, Borussia Mönchengladbach. Fabian Johnson replaces Nico Schulz.
Substitution, Borussia Mönchengladbach. Christoph Kramer replaces Mahmoud Dahoud.
Attempt saved. Paco Alcácer (Barcelona) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Andrés Iniesta.
Mahmoud Dahoud (Borussia Mönchengladbach) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Mahmoud Dahoud (Borussia Mönchengladbach).
Samuel Umtiti (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Goal!  Barcelona 3, Borussia Mönchengladbach 0. Arda Turan (Barcelona) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Aleix Vidal.
Goal!  Barcelona 2, Borussia Mönchengladbach 0. Arda Turan (Barcelona) header from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner.
Corner,  Borussia Mönchengladbach. Conceded by Arda Turan.
Attempt blocked. André Hahn (Borussia Mönchengladbach) right footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Thorgan Hazard with a cross.
Corner,  Borussia Mönchengladbach. Conceded by Samuel Umtiti.
Second Half begins Barcelona 1, Borussia Mönchengladbach 0.
First Half ends, Barcelona 1, Borussia Mönchengladbach 0.

André Gomes (Barcelona) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by André Hahn (Borussia Mönchengladbach).
Attempt missed. Andrés Iniesta (Barcelona) left footed shot from outside the box misses to the right. Assisted by Lionel Messi.
Attempt missed. André Gomes (Barcelona) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Yann Sommer.
Attempt saved. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) left footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Arda Turan.
Goal!  Barcelona 1, Borussia Mönchengladbach 0. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Arda Turan.
Offside, Barcelona. Denis Suárez tries a through ball, but Paco Alcácer is caught offside.
